English version in below

◎時間：

2024/7/7-2024/7/27 (3周）

◎地點：美國明尼蘇達州立大學曼卡托分校

◎費用：

USD 2,500 約新台幣81,000 （費用中含學費、醫療保險、機場接送、校園住宿和膳食（每天三餐）、新生訓練和結業活動、課程教材和社交活動。）*機票和簽證費用不包括在內。參加者需自行負責辦理簽證手續及相關費用。

◎報名時間：2024.5.14截止

◎報名流程

1.填寫google 表單向國際處報名，同時繳交以下文件：

Google form：https://forms.gle/WmHWBvNoCszJfmY28

在學證明
家長同意書   (下載範本Form：海外短期交流家長同意書)
國際處會協助提名給主辦單位
等待姐妹校的通知
欲知詳情，請詳閱附件或遊覽影片及官網：

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S8gW4CKujkY

https://www.mnsu.edu/academics/global-education/centers-of-global-education/center-for-english-language-programs/about-center-for-english-language-program/



注意事項：

國際處僅公告或協助本校學生報名參加簽約校的短期活動或課程，其短期課程是否可抵免本校學分，參加學生需遵照教務處相關規定辦理。若活動日期為本校學期上課期間，學生須依照本校規定自行辦理請假手續。

English version

◎Period：

2024/7/7-2024/7/27 (3 weeks）

◎Location：Minnesota State University, Mankato

◎Fee：

USD 2,500 around NTD 81,000

（Price includes tuition, medical insurance, airport transfer, on-campus accommodations and meals (3 meals a day), orientation and concluding events, course materials and social activities. )

*Airfare and visa fees not included. Participants are responsible for obtaining their visa, including the application process and related fees.

◎Registration Deadline：Until 2024.5.14

1.Sign up via google form and upload below documents to OIA.

Google form：https://forms.gle/WmHWBvNoCszJfmY28

Student Status Certificate
Parental Consent Letter(Form：Parental Consent Letter)
2.The OIA will assist in the nomination process
3. Await the announcement from Minnesota State University

For further information, please check the attached file, watch the linked video or visit their website.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S8gW4CKujkY

https://www.mnsu.edu/academics/global-education/centers-of-global-education/center-for-english-language-programs/about-center-for-english-language-program/

Please note:

The OIA only announces or assists our school’s students in registering for short-term activities or courses offered by contracted schools. Whether credits from these short-term courses can be transferred to our school is subject to the regulations of the Academic Affairs Office, and participating students must comply accordingly. If the activity falls within our school’s academic semester, students must follow our school’s regulations to apply for leave of absence.
